bibl.title: The Chester Beatty Biblical Papyri. Descriptions and Texts of Twelve Manuscripts on Papyrus of the Greek Bible. Fasciculus V. Numbers and Deuteronomy. Fasciculus VI. Isaiah, Jeremiah, Ecclesiasticus. [Part 2.] Plates.
